articles.description: The teaser of Sanya Malhotra starrer ‘Pagglait’ was dropped on the actress’ birthday on Thursday (February 25). The comedy is directed by Umesh Bist.  In the quirky teaser, Sanya is unable to express sorrow on the death of her husband.

articles.title: Gangubai Kathiawadi Teaser: Alia Bhatt embodies power as queen of Kamathipura in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's film - PINKVILLA
articles.description: The teaser featuring Alia Bhatt as the madam of a brothel in Kamathipura in Gangubai Kathiawadi is out and it is bound to leave you intrigued. On Sanjay Leela Bhansali's birthday, the filmmaker surprised everyone with a glimpse of his period drama.
